verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֥ת <S%H8435><s%> These also [are] the generations אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> and Moses בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> [that] the LORD אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> with Moses בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> Sinai

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַבְּכ֣וֹר ׀ <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn נָדָ֑ב <S%H5070><s%> Nadab וַאֲבִיה֕וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar

אֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> These [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests הַמְּשֻׁחִ֑ים <S%H4886><s%> which were anointed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom מִלֵּ֥א <S%H4390><s%> accomplish יָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> able לְכַהֵֽן׃ <S%H3547><s%> to minister in the priest's office

וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> died נָדָ֣ב <S%H5070><s%> And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֣וּא <S%H30><s%> and Abihu לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּֽהַקְרִבָם֩ <S%H7126><s%> when they offered אֵ֨שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire זָרָ֜ה <S%H2114><s%> strange לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינַ֔י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and they had no children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> had לָהֶ֑ם וַיְכַהֵ֤ן <S%H3547><s%> ministered in the priest's office אֶלְעָזָר֙ <S%H499><s%> and Eleazar וְאִ֣יתָמָ֔ר <S%H385><s%> and Ithamar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> in the sight אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron אֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> their father פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

הַקְרֵב֙ <S%H7126><s%> near אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> the tribe לֵוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> Leviite וְֽהַעֲמַדְתָּ֣ <S%H5975><s%> and present אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> them before אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְשֵׁרְת֖וּ <S%H8334><s%> that they may minister אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> And they shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמַרְתּ֗וֹ <S%H4931><s%> his charge וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H4931><s%> and the charge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הָ֣עֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the whole congregation לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> the service הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle

וְשָׁמְר֗וּ <S%H8104><s%> And they shall keep אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵי֙ <S%H3627><s%> all the instruments אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> and the charge בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲבֹדַ֥ת <S%H5656><s%> the service הַמִּשְׁכָּֽן׃ <S%H4908><s%> of the tabernacle

וְנָתַתָּה֙ <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites לְאַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his sons נְתוּנִ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> they [are] wholly given נְתוּנִ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> given הֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> like ל֔וֹ מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto him out of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַהֲרֹ֤ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> and his sons תִּפְקֹ֔ד <S%H6485><s%> And thou shalt appoint וְשָׁמְר֖וּ <S%H8104><s%> and they shall wait on אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּהֻנָּתָ֑ם <S%H3550><s%> their priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <S%H2114><s%> and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <S%H7126><s%> approach יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall be put to death פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> I הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> now behold לָקַ֣חְתִּי <S%H3947><s%> And I behold I have taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites מִתּוֹךְ֙ <S%H8432><s%> from among בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תַּ֧חַת <S%H8478><s%> instead כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of every בְּכ֛וֹר <S%H1060><s%> instead of all the firstborn פֶּ֥טֶר <S%H6363><s%> that openeth רֶ֖חֶם <S%H7358><s%> the matrix מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> become לִ֖י הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> therefore the Levites

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לִי֮ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all בְּכוֹר֒ <S%H1060><s%> Because all the firstborn בְּיוֹם֩ <S%H3117><s%> [are] mine [for] on the day הַכֹּתִ֨י <S%H5221><s%> that I smote כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכ֜וֹר <S%H1060><s%> all the firstborn בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הִקְדַּ֨שְׁתִּי <S%H6942><s%> I hallowed לִ֤י כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּכוֹר֙ <S%H1060><s%> unto me all the firstborn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> in Israel מֵאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> both man עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> and beast לִ֥י יִהְי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> become אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> mine shall they be I [am] the LORD ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

פְּקֹד֙ <S%H6485><s%> Number אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children לֵוִ֔י <S%H3881><s%> Leviite לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> after the house אֲבֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every זָכָ֛ר <S%H2145><s%> every male מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> from a month וָמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward תִּפְקְדֵֽם׃ <S%H6485><s%> shalt thou number

וַיִּפְקֹ֥ד <S%H6485><s%> numbered אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> them according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he צֻוָּֽה׃ <S%H6680><s%> as he was commanded

וַיִּֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And these were the sons לֵוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> Leviite בִּשְׁמֹתָ֑ם <S%H8034><s%> by their names גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <S%H1648><s%> Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> and Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <S%H4847><s%> and Merari

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> And these [are] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families לִבְנִ֖י <S%H3845><s%> Libni וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <S%H8096><s%> and Shimei

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons קְהָ֖ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families עַמְרָ֣ם <S%H6019><s%> Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <S%H3324><s%> and Izehar חֶבְר֖וֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <S%H5816><s%> and Uzziel

וּבְנֵ֧י <S%H1121><s%> And the sons מְרָרִ֛י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> by their families מַחְלִ֣י <S%H4249><s%> Mahli וּמוּשִׁ֑י <S%H4187><s%> and Mushi אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> These [are] מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> according to the house אֲבֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

לְגֵ֣רְשׁ֔וֹן <S%H1648><s%> Of Gershon מִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> [was] the family הַלִּבְנִ֔י <S%H3846><s%> of the Libnites וּמִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> and the family הַשִּׁמְעִ֑י <S%H8097><s%> of the Shimites אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> these [are] the families הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּֽי׃ <S%H1649><s%> of the Gershonites

פְּקֻדֵיהֶם֙ <S%H6485><s%> Those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> of them according to the number כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> of all the males מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> from a month וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward פְּקֻ֣דֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6485><s%> [even] those that were numbered שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> of them [were] seven אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> hundred

מִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> The families הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֑י <S%H1649><s%> of the Gershonites אַחֲרֵ֧י <S%H310><s%> behind הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle יַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> shall pitch יָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> westward

וּנְשִׂ֥יא <S%H5387><s%> And the chief בֵֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אָ֖ב <S%H1><s%> of the father לַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּ֑י <S%H1649><s%> of the Gershonites אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> [shall be] Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son לָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3815><s%> of Lael

וּמִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <S%H4931><s%> And the charge בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons גֵרְשׁוֹן֙ <S%H1648><s%> of Gershon בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> [shall be] the tabernacle וְהָאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> and the tent מִכְסֵ֕הוּ <S%H4372><s%> the covering וּמָסַ֕ךְ <S%H4539><s%> thereof and the hanging פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> for the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְקַלְעֵ֣י <S%H7050><s%> And the hangings הֶֽחָצֵ֗ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מָסַךְ֙ <S%H4539><s%> and the curtain פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> for the door הֶֽחָצֵ֔ר <S%H2691><s%> of the court אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> which [is] by the tabernacle וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> and by the altar סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> round about וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> מֵֽיתָרָ֔יו <S%H4340><s%> and the cords לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> to all עֲבֹדָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5656><s%> of it for all the service

וְלִקְהָ֗ת <S%H6955><s%> And of Kohath מִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> [was] the family הַֽעַמְרָמִי֙ <S%H6020><s%> of the Amramites וּמִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <S%H4940><s%> and the family הַיִּצְהָרִ֔י <S%H3325><s%> of the Izeharites וּמִשְׁפַּ֙חַת֙ <S%H4940><s%> and the family הַֽחֶבְרֹנִ֔י <S%H2276><s%> of the Hebronites וּמִשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> and the family הָֽעָזִּיאֵלִ֑י <S%H5817><s%> of the Uzzielites אֵ֥לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> like מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <S%H4940><s%> these [are] the families הַקְּהָתִֽי׃ <S%H6956><s%> of the Kohathites

בְּמִסְפַּר֙ <S%H4557><s%> In the number כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all זָכָ֔ר <S%H2145><s%> of all the males מִבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> from a month וָמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> and upward שְׁמֹנַ֤ת <S%H8083><s%> [were] eight אֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> and six מֵא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred שֹׁמְרֵ֖י <S%H8104><s%> keeping מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of the sanctuary
